courses.name: Css
courses.about: Learn how to style web pages with CSS, making them visually appealing.
courses.Syllabus:
1. Introduction to CSS
2. CSS Selectors and Properties
3. Box Model and Layouts
4. Responsive Design
5. CSS Animations

courses.name: Photoshop
courses.about: Master Adobe Photoshop for professional-level graphic design and editing.
courses.learn: Basic tools, layers, masks, filters, image manipulation.
courses.Syllabus:
1. Introduction to Photoshop
2. Basic Tools and Panels
3. Working with Layers
4. Filters and Effects
5. Advanced Image Manipulation

courses.name: Fullstack Web Development
courses.about: Learn how to build both the front-end and back-end of web applications.
courses.learn: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, databases, RESTful APIs.
courses.Syllabus:
1. Front-End Fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JS)
2. React and Single Page Applications
3. Backend Development with Node.js
4. Working with Databases
5. Deploying Web Applications

courses.name: React
courses.about: Learn to build interactive UIs using React.
courses.learn: JSX, components, state, props, hooks, and routing.
courses.Syllabus:
1. Introduction to React
2. JSX and Components
3. Managing State and Props
4. React Hooks
5. React Router for Navigation

courses.name: Github
courses.about: Learn how to use Git and GitHub for version control.
courses.learn: Repositories, commits, branches, pull requests, and collaboration.
courses.Syllabus:
1. Introduction to Git and GitHub
2. Setting up Repositories
3. Commit and Version Control
4. Branching and Merging
5. Collaborating on Projects

courses.name: Javascript
courses.about: Learn JavaScript for web development to create dynamic and interactive websites.
courses.learn: Variables, functions, DOM manipulation, event handling, ES6+ features.
courses.Syllabus:
1. Introduction to JavaScript
2. Variables and Data Types
3. Functions and Control Flow
4. DOM Manipulation
5. Modern JavaScript (ES6+)
